Record.ClassificationPath: Parasitic Diseases/Helminthiasis/Nematode Infections/Secernentea Infections/Strongylida Infections/Hookworm Infections/Necatoriasis
Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Disorder by Special Category/Infectious Disorder/Parasitic Infection/Necatoriasis
Record.Description: Infection of humans or animals with hookworms of the genus NECATOR. The resulting anemia from this condition is less severe than that from ANCYLOSTOMIASIS.
